## Webshell/Pattern Name
Name or identifier for this webshell or technique.

## Description
What does this webshell do? What technique is being used?

## Sample Pattern
```
<!-- Example code that should be detected -->
```

## Detection Category
- [ ] InputEvalChain (user input to code execution)
- [ ] DecodeChain (obfuscation/encoding)
- [ ] KnownSignature (specific webshell identifier)
- [ ] SuspiciousFunction (dangerous function usage)
- [ ] DynamicExecution (evasion technique)

## References
Links to threat intelligence, malware analysis, or documentation about this pattern.

## False Positive Risk
How likely is this pattern to match legitimate code?
